H1.text: what is the national flower of hawaii. Orchid

H2.text: what is the national flower of hawaii. Ma'o

H3.text: what is the national flower of hawaii. Hawaiian hibiscus

A4.text: The yellow hibiscus is Hawaii's state flower.

A5.text: The yellow flower of this species was made the official state flower of Hawaii on 6 June 1988.
